# The `AMDGPUAtomicOptimizer.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass optimizes atomic operations by using a single lane of a wavefront to perform the atomic operation, thus reducing contention on that memory location. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This pass optimizes atomic operations by using a single lane of a wavefront to perform the atomic operation, thus reducing contention on that memory location.

Atomic optimizer uses following strategies to compute scan and reduced values
<ul>
<li><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/dpp">DPP</a> - This is the most efficient implementation for scan. <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/dpp">DPP</a> uses Whole Wave Mode (WWM)</li>
<li>Iterative -</li>
</ul>

<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the pointer operand is divergent, then each lane is doing an atomic</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the value operand is divergent, each lane is contributing a different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value to the atomic calculation. We can only optimize divergent values if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we have DPP available on our subtarget (for DPP strategy), and the atomic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operation is 32 or 64 bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValDivergent) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ScanImpl == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0792ed4b093a9c219a38ecd8c868a351a07b4f3d54b63ca923ae3956ba3719911">ScanOptions::DPP</a> &amp;&amp; !ST.hasDPP())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a4edef7895669a4590cda9d1536641222">isLegalCrossLaneType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getType()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we get here, we can optimize the atomic using a single wavefront-wide</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// atomic operation to do the calculation for the entire wavefront, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remember the instruction so we can come back to it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuatomicoptimizer-cpp-/replacementinfo">ReplacementInfo</a> Info = &#123;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, ValIdx, ValDivergent&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ToReplace.push&#95;back(Info);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If any of the other arguments to the intrinsic are divergent, we can&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimize the operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = 1; Idx &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getNumOperands(); Idx++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we get here, we can optimize the atomic using a single wavefront-wide</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// atomic operation to do the calculation for the entire wavefront, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remember the instruction so we can come back to it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuatomicoptimizer-cpp-/replacementinfo">ReplacementInfo</a> Info = &#123;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, ValIdx, ValDivergent&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ToReplace.push&#95;back(Info);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use llvm.cttz intrinsic to find the lowest remaining active lane.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;FF1 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateIntrinsic(Intrinsic::cttz, WaveTy, &#123;ActiveBits, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getTrue()&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LaneIdxInt = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateTrunc(FF1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getInt32Ty());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the value required for atomic operation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LaneValue = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateIntrinsic(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>-&gt;getType(), Intrinsic::amdgcn&#95;readlane,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       &#123;V, LaneIdxInt&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform writelane if intermediate scan results are required later in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// kernel computations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;OldValue = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NeedResult) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OldValue = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateIntrinsic(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>-&gt;getType(), Intrinsic::amdgcn&#95;writelane,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 &#123;Accumulator, LaneIdxInt, OldValuePhi&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OldValuePhi-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#a089cccb6f231efee72abc76d0f9c695f">addIncoming</a>(OldValue, ComputeLoop);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Accumulate the results</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;NewAccumulator = <a href="#a901713396cfcbec90b074b04f7eda2bf">buildNonAtomicBinOp</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64instrinfo-cpp/#abb0a82cf9ab3cf0c256918c17512f987aa66d3974b6f2e3a542f896da144cd297">Accumulator</a>, LaneValue);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64instrinfo-cpp/#abb0a82cf9ab3cf0c256918c17512f987aa66d3974b6f2e3a542f896da144cd297">Accumulator</a>-&gt;addIncoming(NewAccumulator, ComputeLoop);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set bit to zero of current active lane so that for next iteration llvm.cttz</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return the next active lane</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateShl(ConstantInt::get(WaveTy, 1), FF1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;InverseMask = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateXor(Mask, ConstantInt::get(WaveTy, -1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;NewActiveBits = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateAnd(ActiveBits, InverseMask);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ActiveBits-&gt;addIncoming(NewActiveBits, ComputeLoop);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Branch out of the loop when all lanes are processed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;IsEnd = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateICmpEQ(NewActiveBits, ConstantInt::get(WaveTy, 0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateCondBr(IsEnd, ComputeEnd, ComputeLoop);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First we need to set all inactive invocations to the identity value, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that they can correctly contribute to the final result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewV =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateIntrinsic(Intrinsic::amdgcn&#95;set&#95;inactive, Ty, &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>, Identity&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NeedResult &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>.hasPermLaneX16()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On GFX10 the permlanex16 instruction helps us build a reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// without too many readlanes and writelanes, which are generally bad</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for performance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewV = buildReduction(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, ScanOp, NewV, Identity);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewV = buildScan(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, ScanOp, NewV, Identity);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NeedResult)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ExclScan = buildShiftRight(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, NewV, Identity);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Read the value from the last lane, which has accumulated the values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of each active lane in the wavefront. This will be our new value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which we will provide to the atomic operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastLaneIdx = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getInt32(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>.getWavefrontSize() - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewV = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateIntrinsic(Ty, Intrinsic::amdgcn&#95;readlane,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 &#123;NewV, LastLaneIdx&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finally mark the readlanes in the WWM section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewV = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateIntrinsic(Intrinsic::amdgcn&#95;strict&#95;wwm, Ty, NewV);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ScanImpl == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0792ed4b093a9c219a38ecd8c868a351a701d2133d12ea3a960045f52be3d34b6">ScanOptions::Iterative</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Alternative implementation for scan</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ComputeLoop = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ComputeLoop&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ComputeEnd = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ComputeEnd&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::tie(ExclScan, NewV) = buildScanIteratively(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, ScanOp, Identity, V, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                      ComputeLoop, ComputeEnd);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Atomic Optimzer is disabled for None strategy&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unhandled atomic op&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst/#a461cfbbb5c7a57ab73210498923cf615a0794c42b44989f9d9f1454d79ca0dd88">AtomicRMWInst::Add</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst/#a461cfbbb5c7a57ab73210498923cf615a5db6ca0c3e18acd87290f22ccb2ce564">AtomicRMWInst::Sub</a>: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new value we will be contributing to the atomic operation is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// old value times the number of active lanes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ctpop = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateIntCast(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewV = <a href="#a89944cd09491dac3b7131a58b7e369bc">buildMul</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, V, Ctpop);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst/#a461cfbbb5c7a57ab73210498923cf615a08ef06068dcd583c2476568dda59b324">AtomicRMWInst::FAdd</a>:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst/#a461cfbbb5c7a57ab73210498923cf615a660a31179bfecd737a256372e5fd6122">AtomicRMWInst::And</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst/#a461cfbbb5c7a57ab73210498923cf615a5954f59053121b87ebe0c5fe79942c6e">AtomicRMWInst::Or</a>:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst/#a461cfbbb5c7a57ab73210498923cf615a39edb6e51c1ad37244e8b32a2af4077d">AtomicRMWInst::Min</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst/#a461cfbbb5c7a57ab73210498923cf615abe171d96ba8de66fb30e08c00211591e">AtomicRMWInst::UMax</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst/#a461cfbbb5c7a57ab73210498923cf615aa53854e09143f57d2ff2ad6ac89dc55d">AtomicRMWInst::UMin</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst/#a461cfbbb5c7a57ab73210498923cf615abd5e733a10a36f3572105b1a67538e18">AtomicRMWInst::FMin</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst/#a461cfbbb5c7a57ab73210498923cf615acce124326ba87b0127b36c412bf555fd">AtomicRMWInst::FMax</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These operations with a uniform value are idempotent: doing the atomic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operation multiple times has the same effect as doing it once.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst/#a461cfbbb5c7a57ab73210498923cf615a71aab8ee954b6d71a4eed315e8f6556e">AtomicRMWInst::Xor</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new value we will be contributing to the atomic operation is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// old value times the parity of the number of active lanes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ctpop = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateIntCast(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewV = <a href="#a89944cd09491dac3b7131a58b7e369bc">buildMul</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, V, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateAnd(Ctpop, 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We only want a single lane to enter our new control flow, and we do this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by checking if there are any active lanes below us. Only one lane will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have 0 active lanes below us, so that will be the only one to progress.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateICmpEQ(Mbcnt, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getInt32(0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store I&#39;s original basic block before we split the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OriginalBB = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to introduce some new control flow to force a single lane to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// active. We do this by splitting I&#39;s basic block at I, and introducing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new block such that:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entry --&gt; single&#95;lane -\\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  //       \\------------------&gt; exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SingleLaneTerminator =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad957413955739c91204c96e33e0cc933">SplitBlockAndInsertIfThen</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &amp;DTU, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a> = <a href="#a901713396cfcbec90b074b04f7eda2bf">buildNonAtomicBinOp</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, BroadcastI, LaneOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isAtomicFloatingPointTy) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For fadd/fsub the first active lane of LaneOffset should be the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// identity (-0.0 for fadd or 0 for fsub) but the value we calculated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is V &#42; 0 which might have the wrong sign or might be nan (if V is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inf or nan).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For all floating point ops if the in-memory value was a nan then the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// binop we just built might have quieted it or changed its payload.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Correct all these problems by using BroadcastI as the result in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// first active lane.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateSelect(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>, BroadcastI, Result);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
